folderName: BOT tags are shown and no status is displayed

inline.description:
BOT tag is visible on Pinned posts
————————————————————————————
1. Locate a post created by a BOT and pin it to the channel using the post menu
2. Open the Pinned posts for the channel
inline.expectedResult: BOT tag is visible in cases where the author is a bot  and no status is displayed
